data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: He was the son of a doctor. He ____ sent ____ the ____ Rugby School in 1784, ____ was ____ in 1791, ____ avoid ____. He ____ went ____ to ____ at Trinity College, Oxford University but ____ also ____ from ____ in 1794. After this, he developed some problems with his father, who was very angry at him, so Landor left his home.
data.partBlankContent: He was the son of a doctor. He w__ sent t_ the fam___ Rugby School in 1784, b__ was rem____ in 1791, t_ avoid expu_____. He th__ went u_ to st___ at Trinity College, Oxford University but w__ also rusti_____ from th___ in 1794. After this, he developed some problems with his father, who was very angry at him, so Landor left his home.
data.answer: 他是医生的儿子。1784年，他被送到著名的拉格比学校，但在1791年被开除，以避免被开除。随后，他进入牛津大学三一学院学习，但也在1794年被逐出乡村。在这之后，他和他的父亲发生了一些问题，他的父亲对他非常生气，所以兰多尔离开了他的家。
